<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> he them <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G5101>Whom<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> you? And they <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3478>Nazareth.<s%>

They <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1487>If<s%> he were not a <S%G2555>malefactor,<s%> we would not have <S%G3860>delivered<s%> him up to you.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> to them, <S%G2983>Take<s%> you him, and <S%G2919>judge<s%> him <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3551>law.<s%> The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, It is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for us to <S%G615>put<s%> <S%G3762>any<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> to <S%G615>death:<s%>
